executable.title: MergeStatWithFiber
executable.description: This command line complete a vtk file with arc_length and associated parameters such as FA, MD, ...

file.name: csv_input
file.label: CSV Input File
file.description: CSV file that provides data to complete the vtk file

file.name: output_vtk_file
file.label: Output VTK File
file.description: Name of the output VTK file

float.name: interpolation_min
float.label: Minimum of Interpolation
float.description: Minimum used in the interpolation of values

float.name: interpolation_max
float.label: Maximum of Interpolation
float.description: Maximum used in the interpolation of values
